name: jsonp
description: JSONP provides a JSONPRequest object for reusable cross-domain requests to web services that support JSONP output and a Y.jsonp(..) method to instantiate and send a JSONPRequest.
author: lsmith

examples.name: jsonp-github
examples.displayName: Getting Cross Domain JSON Data Using Y.jsonp()
examples.description: Get basic GitHub user info using a Y.jsonp(url, callback).

examples.name: jsonp-gallery
examples.displayName: Reusing a JSONPRequest Instance to Poll a Remote Server
examples.description: Create a reusable JSONPRequest object to poll the YUILibrary.com Gallery web service, fetching info on a random Gallery module.
